Package org.agilej.sparkle.core.request

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Serializer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSessionStore  
    AbstractWebRequest  
    AcceptHeaderLocaleResolver
    Locale resolver which get locale from http header.
    CookieBasedLocaleResolver
    Locale resolver which can get and set locale from cookie value.
    CookieBasedSessionStore
    Store session values in cookie, use a app-scope configured secret_key_base to encrypt data like Rails.
    GsonSerializer
    Serializer use Google Gson to dump object to json string, and load from json to object.
    JacksonSerializer
    Serializer use Jackson to dump object to json string, and load from json to object.
    LocaleResolverHolder
    global locale resolver holder
    LocaleResolverResolver
    resolver for LocaleResolver, will fallback to a default locale resolver if user not config it.
    MessageEncryptor  
    ObjectSerializer  
    SessionFacade
    a session facade which will delegate session operation to application configured SessionStore
    SessionStoreHolder
    global session store holder
    SessionStoreResolver
    resolver for SessionStore, will fallback to a default session store if user not config it.
    SimpleMemorySessionStore
    use a in memory hash map to store session values
